website_summaries.verdict: A small, affordable purifier that attacks odors and germs with the freshening power of negative ions.
pros: In addition to purifying cabin air, it has two USB ports for your devices
Not as large and cumbersome as some other choices
cons: A few owners have complained that the unit slips out of their cigarette charger

customer_reviews.title: Policeman Reviews
customer_reviews.text: I have used this purifier in a vehicle used to transport a dog regularly. It took a couple days of having it plugged in overnight, but I slowly began noticing it smelling fresher and fresher each day. Within a week, my vehicle was virtually odor free, no more dog smell.
customer_reviews.author: Policeman

customer_reviews.title: Compact air purifier with 2 USB ports! Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this air purifier for many reasons! It’s compact, it lights up to indicate that’s its working, it has two USB ports for charging! I’d say that there’s not many cons - i think my cigarette lighter is slightly bigger, so it comes loose at times, so I have to be sure it’s plugged in each time I get in the car. I do feel that it has improved the air quality in my car - no longer smells like food if i leave some leftover fries in there! I want to continue to use it to see if it helps my allergies when the pollen is bad.
customer_reviews.author: Sara B. Blankestyn

customer_reviews.title: I don't really notice it, and it doesn't seem to make any difference
customer_reviews.text: I don't really notice it, and it doesn't seem to make any difference. I expected it would kill odors and emit a clean, sanitized odor but it doesn't seem to emit any odor.
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay in outlet well.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t stay in the plug well I had to wrap it in tape to get it to stay secure. If you work out of your truck and will be going on rough terrain I do not recommend it I will probably just stick to regular air fresheners. It sticks out way to far from the dash for it to not be a secure fit. I’d like to try the shorter one with out charger slots but I’m definitely not buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Mlayne

customer_reviews.title: Effective and pleasant
customer_reviews.text: I seldom drive my car and was looking for a product that would keep it fresh smelling between uses. This product fits the bill and produces a slight ozone scent that seems to neutralize the odors in the car. It fits nicely in the console of my Focus ST. The additional benefit of 2 USB charging ports is also welcome addition when traveling with a companion.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: it worked to remove a moldy smell in the cabin of our vehicle
customer_reviews.text: We were skeptical and did not review immediately because we wanted to give it a chance to perform. It not happen overnight . . . but in about three weeks we are convinced that the ionizer has helped.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Holy cow! It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised that after a few minutes in my car I could actually tell the difference in the air quality. I don’t know how to describe it other than the air feels crisp.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: These things are difficult to judge because of the size but it still works and my car hasn't caught fire
customer_reviews.author: Rumplestilskin

customer_reviews.title: Charges fast
customer_reviews.text: Plugged our iPad (it usually charges really slowly) into this so that we can have both going at the same time and it actually charged up really well. Thought that was just a bonus but worked great!
customer_reviews.author: MarcusA

customer_reviews.title: Takes odors out really good!
customer_reviews.text: This takes out odors really good! I had it in my car and it works great so I put it in my boyfriends stinky truck :) took the odors out of it by the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Shan H

customer_reviews.title: Novelty item
customer_reviews.text: The “ionizer” is a small plastic fan that burnt up in less than a week and stopped working. Even when it did work it did nothing to the sent or air quality in my truck. So now I just have a double USB 12v plug with a blue light on it.
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Cant even tell
customer_reviews.text: You can't even tell that this product works at all. Tried it and seen no difference in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this in my car for several months. I have less dust on my dash and the car smells good.
customer_reviews.author: CL Cadwallader

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again. Lasts long time
customer_reviews.text: Still working well months later. It has a charging port. Nice product
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: really has not gotten ride of the smoke smell
customer_reviews.text: I purchase to get ride of the smell of smoke in car from some one who smoked in it. So far the smell is still there it has not worked very well
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: FRiEQ Car Air Purifier
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my semi truck. runs 24/7. Works better then I thought it would. Removes that lived in smell and replaces it with a lite fresh air smell. Love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Sykes

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit properly
customer_reviews.text: The charger did not fit well into the plug. It was to loose and didn’t keep constant connection. Also there was no noticeable change to the air at all and couldn’t tell if it was working or not. Seemed like a useless product.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M.

customer_reviews.title: Wasted $
customer_reviews.text: Has a cute blue light at the end. That’s it! That’s all it does. No air purification, no ionizing, no filtration, nothing at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Pohl

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: One USB port didn't work and didn't really make a difference with the smoke. Would hv returned but missed the window.
customer_reviews.author: Delaah

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Product doesn’t work. Product also doesn’t stay seated in the outlet. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: air cleaner
customer_reviews.text: havent it had it long enough but it seems ok
customer_reviews.author: Richard  Lacroix

customer_reviews.title: Unsure
customer_reviews.text: I think it works but it's new so I would have to revisit this in another 2 months
customer_reviews.author: G nana

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Connection cheaply made - stays loose in the socket and doesn't get a good connection for continuous operation.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good USB charger not an air filter
customer_reviews.text: The power of three USB works but it doesn't filter air at all
customer_reviews.author: J. Bouissiere

product_meta.title: FRIEQ Car Air Purifier, Car Air Freshener and 2-in-1 Ionic Air Purifier | Remove Dust, Pollen, Smoke and Bad Odors - Available for Your Auto or RV
feature_bullets: The strongest car interior accessory releases 5.63 million negative ions per cm³ in your car for massive odor-fighting power，it is better for your health.
There are two usb interfaces, they are more convenient to charge your phone and pad, and blue LED light enhances auto decorating.

With a measurable and controllable quantity of negative oxygen ions, this compact unit destroys bad odor effectively getting rid of smoke smell and other stale odors, neutralizes contaminants like mold, bacteria and viruses purifying the environment helping you breathe easier.
Car air purifier produces negative ions that actually improve the air quality by destroying odor-causing particulates from the air, rather than simply covering up the smells like perfume.
Please note: the voltage should be 12V/24v before you use our car air purifier. Plug directly into the 12v/24v cigarette outlet. Cool Automotive Accessories.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars105 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
